hero2: Junior Hardware Engineer, PCB Design, and Embedded Technologies
description: I am a Hardware Engineer with a deep passion for electronics and solid experience in designing and developing autonomous vehicles for indoor environments. I oversee the entire electrical development process‚Äîfrom selecting sensors and integrating motors, to designing printed circuit boards and assembling all components, up to the delivery of the final product. I work with precision and a methodical approach, standing out for my problem-solving mindset and strong team spirit. I am proficient in CAD software such as EasyEDA, KiCad, and AutoCAD Electrical, and I also handle technical documentation and testing activities. In my free time, I enjoy swimming and snowboarding. I am always seeking new professional challenges to grow and actively contribute to innovation.
